scriptItem.label: Add Parameter Camera
scriptItem.scriptCode:
import hou hda_type_name = "MAG_InfoCamera::1.0" node_type = hou.nodeType(hou.objNodeTypeCategory(), hda_type_name) hda_def = node_type.definition() exec(hda_def.sections()["PythonModule"].contents())
attachInfo(kwargs, 'text_info')
